modName: Gothic Inspired Weapons - Wrath of Stendar
summary: Adds a new gothic inspired Sword.
descriptionHtml:
----------------------------------- 
Gothic Inspired Weapons - Wrath of Stendar 
----------------------------------- 

One of my mods for Skyrim. 
This mod adds a sword into the game that design is inspired by the \"Innos Wrath\" from Gothic 1 
and \"Orcish Warlordsword\" from Gothic 2 (both are german RPGs). 

Now also on Steamworkshop ! 



Requirement 
========= 
Just Skyrim (No DLC required) 


Install 
========= 
Just install it, suscribe it, endorse it. 

Craftable and Temperable. 

for cheaters use the console 
help \"wrath of stendar\"
and add it to your inventory. 


Enjoy!! and have fun !! (Oh if someone wants to make a better texture, just go ahead and send it to me via nexus and i will upload it.) 

Should be compatible with all Skyrim Versions and Languages. 




Credits 
========= 
Thanks to Bethesda for the best games. 
Thanks to Pluto 13 for Gothic 1 and Gothic 2, very good german Rpgs. 


Knowing Issuise/Bugs 
========= 
No bugs known jet. 



=== CHANGELOG === 

version 1 
- Initial release
author: mach1991
